SELECT dr.drugId,dr.drugName,un.unitId,un.unitName,dr.sellingPrice,ar.areaId,ar.areaName,ty.typeId,ty.typeName from drugdictionary dr,unit un,type ty,area ar where dr.unitId=un.unitId and dr.areaId=ar.areaId and dr.typeId=ty.typeId
and dr.drugName like concat('%' ,concat(#{drugName},'%'))
ORDER BY dr.drugId desc
SELECT count(*) from drugstore where drugstoreName=#{drugstoreName} and batch=#{batch}
SELECT sum(drugstorenum) from drugstore where drugstoreName=#{drugstoreName}
